cover.top: The sun peeked over the hills to start the day.
cover.bottom: Once long ago, people told stories using the colors of dawn.

river-town.top: On the riverbanks, traders welcomed boats from distant lands.
river-town.bottom: Grandmothers whispered how every tide carried a tiny piece of history.

top: Builders raised stone arches that met in the middle like clasped hands.
Across the plaza, new arches started to mirror the old.
bottom: Across the river, children practiced the same stories in new voices.
Each echo promised the past would keep flowing forward.
